description:
The changing of the seasons affects the mood of everyone in the Diving Club, especially Katori Mato. However, she ends up finding ways to enjoy the moment with a little help from her friends.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ame no Owari no Koto / Natsu no Hajimari no Koto
The Story of the End of Rain / The Story of the Beginning of Summer
雨のおわりのコト / 夏のはじまりのコト
